attributes.action: Allow viewing of CCTV to track lost pets, through charity I plan to start
attributes.additional_details:
While searching for my own lost cat, I have come across so many people who are also going through the heartbreak of losing their furry friend.
There are many charities and places around that do their best to help reunite pets with their owners, but most of them are only able to put together lost and found with similarities. Which has proven to be a waiting game majority of the time.
Leaflets and posters will only do so much. Most of the time, it's not enough.
This could save so many pets lives.
attributes.background:
Many people lose their pets everyday
I have recently lost one also.
Most of these pets never get found and are never reunited with their owners.
Through the power of CCTV, these pets could potentially be tracked within an hour if we had the power to view CCTV to track and find them.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
